articles.author: Tushar Joshi
articles.title: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar review: Ranbir Kapoor’s return to rom-com is the perfect relief we waited for - India Today
articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor play the cat-and-mouse game of who will duck the bullet first and escape the guilt pangs of a bad breakup. The film's second half and peppy climax redeem its lazy first half and making it a worthy entertainer. Read our review.
articles.content: By Tushar Joshi: Ranbir Kapoor isnt new to a romantic comedy (rom-com). In fact, he has aced the genre several times (Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, Bachna Ae Haseeno) in his long and versatile filmography… [+4364 chars]
